channel.title: Lobby pop up on server
channel.description:
WHEN YOU LOG ON RUNESCAPE IT TAKES YOU TO THE LOBBY WHERE YOU can logon, chat, firends list, settings etc.
will i want to make my server so it a lobby when you log on like about server and stuff . help xD

item.title: Lobby pop up on server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

That meme is overused as-is. I don’t even think you know who is depicted in that image.

I am not being a badass, I am explaining the situation to you. I’m not going to sit here and hold your hand, because that’s not how things work here, or in real life.

To create a new interface like that requires (even hardcoding) a lot of effort, and tweaking to get it the way you want, or even close.

This is more of a client-side topic anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Lobby pop up on server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“F2p Blackscape, post:6, topic:470059”]jsut tell me where to add it
i know about codings boy
don’t judge me, you don’t know meh… -.-[/quote]

First of all, I don’t have the code.
Second, the code necessary to just “plug and play” is highly dependent on both your server and client, and can vary dramatically between 2 similar bases.
Third, if you don’t know how to program (which is really just problem solving), then no amount of code we give you will work exactly like you want it to.
Fourth, I’m not judging you, I’m explaining the situation to you.

Read full topic
